DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Registry study observe improvement subject-reported clinical outcome percutaneous orthopedic procedure treatment musculoskeletal disorder .
DOC.detailed_description: This Registry design assure benefit knowledge gain study clinical outcome associate use percutaneous orthopedic procedure outweigh potential risk patient . The primary objective Registry observe improvement subject-reported clinical outcome procedure use treat musculoskeletal disorder . Secondary objective include evaluate post-treatment complication , adverse event , re-injections , surgical intervention . Patients receive percutaneous orthopedic treatment ask enroll receive treatment complete set baseline questionnaire regard pain functionality area body treat ( i.e . knee , shoulder , spine , etc ) . Follow-up outcome collect 1 month , 3 month , 6 month , 12 month , 18 month , annually 2-20 year post-injection . Subjects withdraw Registry prematurely surgical operation occurs .
DOC.criteria: Candidates must meet ALL follow : 1 . Voluntary signature IRB approve Informed Consents , 2 . Treated Regenexx procedure 3 . Have musculoskeletal condition appropriate procedure osteoarthritis internal joint derangement ; ligament tendon injury ; intervertebral disc degeneration ; protrusion , extrusion , annular tear ; muscle tear
